tool_description: Coordinates and schedules volunteer interviews between candidates and staff members, considering availability, preferences, and organizational constraints.

candidate_ids.description: List of candidate IDs to schedule interviews for

interviewer_ids.description: List of available interviewer staff IDs

interview_type.description: Type of interview: phone, video, in_person

error_messages: No candidates provided: At least one candidate ID must be specified.
No interviewers available: At least one interviewer ID must be provided.
Invalid interview type: Type must be phone, video, or in_person.
Invalid duration: Duration must be between 15 and 120 minutes.
No available dates: At least one available date must be provided.
Scheduling conflict: Unable to find suitable times for all requested interviews.
usage: Provide candidate IDs, interviewer IDs, and available dates. Optionally specify interview type and duration. The tool will find optimal scheduling combinations and send invitations.

scheduled_interviews.description: List of successfully scheduled interview IDs

failed_scheduling.description: Candidate IDs that could not be scheduled

calendar_invites_sent.description: Whether calendar invitations were successfully sent
